purpleculture_pinyin:
chù
place; location; spot; point; office; department; bureau; respect; classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
место; место расположения; место; точка; офис; отделение; бюро; уважать; классификатор локаций или предметов повреждений: точка, точка

chǔ
to reside; to live; to dwell; to be in; to be situated at; to stay; to get along with; to be in a position of; to deal with; to discipline; to punish
проживать; жить; проживать; быть в; находиться по адресу; остаться; ладить с; быть в положении; иметь дело с; к дисциплине; наказать
rtega_mnemonic:
處處RS
处处		処place, locale, department, dispose, sentence, punish
  • RS. the sound of the tiger 虍/虎 as it stands up 儿 and walks around 夂 from it's resting place 處 → 処 → 处 (sentenced to life in a zoo)
  • ⓢ person 亻 standing 儿 up from his place and walking 夂 and dispose of something (sentenced to life in prison)
  • ⓢ place where a prophecy 卜 says one goes 夂 to live
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 处)
Pictophonetic: 虍 indicates the sound; 処 (place) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
處處 [ chù chù ]: everywhere; in all respects
處理 [ chǔ lǐ ]: to handle; to treat; to deal with; to process; to deal with a criminal case; to mete out punishment; to offer for sale at a reduced price; to punish
處於 [ chǔ yú ]: to be in (some state, position, or condition)
處罰 [ chǔ fá ]: to penalize; to punish
處在 [ chǔ zài ]: to be situated at; to find oneself at

humanum_full_description_en:
The original meaning of " place " is a place of dwelling and resting.

" At the word Bronze" from " people " from " a few ", " stripe of a tiger ," the sound will be a few people sitting on the rest of Italy, the original meaning of abode cease. Adding " stop " under more than human form, Ogjun starts the car and saves to " Xiao ". When it is said that the tiger occupies the shape of a tiger, the few at the bottom right of the word should refer to the back foot of the tiger (Sun Yunhe).

Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning to indicate where to live. Zhongshan Wang Yuanhu: "cannot rest in peace." It also means living, the wall plate: "Qing (quiet) is quiet and high and (ancestor), only (at) the place of Wei Di (spirit)."

"Said Wen": "Place, stop. You have to stop. From the few from the 夂. From the place, or from the sound.". The word " location " was later extended to mean the place, place, and location where things happened.
humanum_short_description_en: The original meaning of "being" is a place of dwelling and resting.
humanum_full_description:
「處」本義是居停、止息之所。

　　「處」字金文從「人」從「几」，「虍」聲，會人坐在几上休息之意，本義是居處、止息。多於人形下加「止」，噩君啟車節省去「虍」。一說象虎盤踞之形，字右下方的几原應指虎的後腳(孫雲鶴)。

　　金文用作本義，表示居處，中山王圓壺：「不能寧處」。又表示居住，牆盤：「青(靜)幽高且(祖)，才(在)微霝(靈)處。」

　　《說文》：「処，止也。得几而止。从几从夂。處，処或从虍聲。」。「處」字後來引申為事情發生的所在、地方，處所等意思。

    • 処 [ chǔ ] place, locale; department
①地方：處處。處所。
②點，部分：長(cháng)處。好處。
③機關，或機關、團體、單位裏的部門：辦事處。籌備處。
處處 [ chù chù ]: everywhere; in all respects
①居住：穴居野處。
②存在，置身：設身處地。處心積慮。處世。
③跟別人一起生活，交往：融洽相處。
④決定，決斷：處理。
⑤對犯錯誤或有罪的人給予相當的懲戒：處罰。處決。
⑥止，隱退：處暑。

處罰 [ chǔ fá ]: to penalize; to punish
處在 [ chǔ zài ]: to be situated at; to find oneself at

Chinese: The taskmaster sees a tiger and slowly takes long steps away to change location.  
Meaning: location
Hanzi: 処处
Story: The taskmaster can change location with the magic wand.
Kind: traditional

「 處 」本義是居停、止息之所。 「 處 」字金文從「 人 」從「 几 」，「 虍 」聲，會人坐在几上休息之意，本義是居處、止息。多於人形下加「 止 」，噩君啟車節省去「 虍 」。一說象虎盤踞之形，字右下方的几原應指虎的後腳(孫雲鶴)。 金文用作本義，表示居處，中山王圓壺：「不能寧處」。又表示居住，牆盤：「青(靜)幽高且(祖)，才(在)微霝(靈)處。」 《說文》：「処，止也。得几而止。从几从夂。處，処或从虍聲。」。「 處 」字後來引申為事情發生的所在、地方，處所等意思。
The original meaning of " place" is a place of dwelling and resting. " At the word Bronze" from " people" from " a few", " stripe of a tiger," the sound will be a few people sitting on the rest of Italy, the original meaning of abode cease. Adding " stop" under more than human form, Ogjun starts the car and saves to " Xiao". When it is said that the tiger occupies the shape of a tiger, the few at the bottom right of the word should refer to the back foot of the tiger (Sun Yunhe). Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning to indicate where to live. Zhongshan Wang Yuanhu: "cannot rest in peace." It also means living, the wall plate: "Qing (quiet) is quiet and high and (ancestor), only (at) the place of Wei Di (spirit)." "Said Wen": "Place, stop. You have to stop. From the few from the 夂. From the place, or from the sound.". The word " location" was later extended to mean the place, place, and location where things happened.

處字的基本解释

處
chǔ

處字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǔ］
［《廣韻》昌與切，上語，昌。］
亦作“処1”。“处1”的繁体字。
(1)居住；居于，处在。
(2)居家不仕，隐居。
(3)指女子居家或未嫁。参见“處女”。
(4)安居；安身。
(5)留，留下。
(6)自居。
(7)停止，止歇。
(8)对待。
(9)相处，交往。
(10)引申为相交往的人，即老朋友。
(11)交，交接；交战。
(12)安顿；安排。
(13)引申为处置，发落。
(14)处罚，惩办。
(15)治理；办理。
(16)指办法。
(17)决断；定夺。
(18)委任，任用。
(19)当，担任；承受。
(20)保持；执持。
(21)主持；执掌。
(22)谋生，维持生活。
(23)审度；辨察。
(24)分别。
(25)成立，建立。参见“處家”。
(26)占，占有。
(27)生病。
(28)享有；据有；取。
(29)筹划，设法；打算，着想。
(30)聚，聚集。
(31)常，定准

處字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虍字部】　處； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1073第25
【唐韻】昌與切【集韻】【正韻】敞呂切，?音杵。【玉篇】居也。【詩·王風】莫或遑處。　又止也。【詩·召南】其後也處。　【廣韻】留也，息也，定也。　又居室也。【詩·大雅】于時處處。　又歸也。【左傳·襄四年】民有寢廟，獸有茂草，各有攸處。　又分別也。【晉書·杜預傳】處分旣定，乃啓請伐吳之期。　又制也。【晉書·食貨志】人閒巧僞滋多，雖處以嚴?，而不能禁也。　又姓。【前漢·藝文志】《處子》九篇。【師古註】《史記》云：趙有處子。【廣韻】《風俗通》云：漢有北海太守處興。　又州名。【一統志】晉屬永嘉郡，隋置處州。　又【廣韻】讀去聲，昌據切。所也。【詩·邶風】爰居爰處，爰喪其馬。【魯語】五?三次。【註】次，處也。三處，野、朝、市也。　又【集韻】居御切。通據。人名，齊有梁丘處。　又通杵。【公羊傳·僖十二年】?侯處臼卒。【註】《左傳》作杵臼。　【說文】作処。　【廣韻】俗作䖏。 考證：〔【詩·王風】其後也處。〕　謹照原書王風改召南。

Place
chǔ
Place
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chǔ]
["Guangyun" Chang and Qi, Shangyu, Chang. ]
Also referred to as "Office 1". Traditional characters of "处1".
(1) To live; to live in, to be present.
(2) Living in seclusion without being an official.
(3) Refers to women who live at home or are unmarried. See "virgin".
(4) Settle down; settle down.
(5) Stay, stay.
(6) Self-proclaimed.
(7) Stop, stop.
(8) Treat.
(9) Get along and associate.
(10) It is extended to people who associate with each other, that is, old friends.
(11) Handover, handover; warring.
(12) Settle; arrange.
(13) The extension refers to disposal and release.
(14) Punishment, punishment.
(15) Governance; handling.
(16) Refers to the method.
(17) Decide; decide.
(18) Appointment, appointment.
(19) Be, serve; accept.
(20) Maintain; hold.
(21) Presiding; taking charge.
(22) Make a living and maintain a living.
(23) Examination; Discernment.
(24) Respectively.
(25) Establishment, establishment. See "Chujia".
(26) Occupy, possess.
(27) Sick.
(28) Enjoy; possess; take.
(29) Planning, trying; planning, thinking.
(30) Gather, gather.
(31) Often, fixed
